items.summary: On the pre-meditation setup view (PreMeditationPage when phase is "setup"), move the "More Details" button so it is centered at the bottom of the meditation guide container (not positioned at the top-right).

On the in-session meditation view (PreMeditationPage when phase is "active"), increase the size of the two standard slider control containers (volume and time/seek) so they are easier to use (e.g., larger container height and/or padding) while keeping them as standard slider inputs and preserving their current behavior.

On the in-session meditation view (PreMeditationPage when phase is "active"), restyle the play/pause button so it better matches the appâ€™s existing theme and also adjust its sizing/shape (not just colors).
